1.details: Create vendor mirror tables (vendor_products, vendor_variants, vendor_images, vendor_inventory_levels), import decision tracking, product overrides, and live inventory views. Add vendor mapping columns to existing product_variants table.

2.details: Implement 6 API routes: /api/vendor-shopify/sync (GraphQL catalog), /api/vendor-shopify/inventory (REST inventory), /api/vendor-shopify/webhooks (HMAC verified), /api/vendor-shopify/import (selective import), /api/product-overrides (admin edits), /api/checkout/validate (stock validation)

3.details: Create new 'Vendor Inbox' card showing count from v_vendor_inbox_count view. Build click-through table displaying vendor products with multi-select import functionality, stage/skip actions, and live inventory display.

4.details: Integrate live vendor inventory into existing product pages and checkout flow. Implement inventory reservations to prevent overselling during checkout process.

5.details: Set up cron jobs (nightly catalog sync, 15-min inventory sync), implement webhook security (HMAC verification), add admin auth protection to all API routes, and configure environment variables.
